name: Generate Tests
description: Generate unit tests for the current file

action.message:
Generate comprehensive unit tests for the currently open file:

1. Analyze the code structure and identify testable functions/classes
2. Generate test cases using the appropriate framework (Jest for JS/TS, pytest for Python, JUnit for Java)
3. Include:
   - Happy path tests
   - Edge cases
   - Error handling tests
   - Mock external dependencies
4. Create the test file with proper naming convention
5. Show me the generated tests
